One is a knight, and the other is a wizard. And just like in the game, Makoto becomes the \"princess\"! In order to save Princess Makoto from the wicked wizard, the cool knight Nanase begins living with her!?  \n  \n2) The Fallen Angel (Tenshi Tsuiraku)  \nThis is a secret: Heaven is a company, and angels are its employees! Hashiba is just a beginning angel in the death department, so she spends most of her time on earth. She's very excited when she receives her first assignment–until it turns out that the soul she's supposed to take to heaven is that of Toujou-kun, a human boy who's always been nice to her. She doesn't want him to die… Is this the beginning of an angel falling?  \n  \n3) Moonlight The Shine of Love (Tsuki no Hikari, Koi no Kagayaki)  \nA tremendous force pulls moon fairy Kouya down to earth, but when she finds the boy responsible, he claims he did nothing to draw her to him and tells her to go home. Small-time crook Yotaro has never forgotten the rakugo tale \"The God of Death,\" which the master Yurakutei Yakumo performed for Yotaro during his time in prison. d528a5fd-e033-4283-b7e8-a048da2a73aa:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"d528a5fd-e033-4283-b7e8-a048da2a73aa","title":{"en":"New Treasure Island (1984)"},"altTitles":[{"ja-ro":"Shin Takarajima (1984)"},{"ja":"新宝島"},{"fr":"La nouvelle Île au Trésor"},{"it":"La nuova isola del tesoro"},{"es":"A Nova Ilha do Tesouro"},{"pt-br":"A Nova Ilha do Tesouro"},{"ko":"신보물섬"},{"ko-ro":"sinbomulseom"}],"lastChapter":"1","availableTranslatedLanguages":["pt-br","en"],"relatedIds":["63487511-434d-4a98-a1da-13bf80e9fcb8"],"description":{"en":"One day a boy named Pete finds a map of \"Treasure Island\" that his deceased father left behind. He starts on a voyage to find it together with \"Captain,\" who was a friend of his father. But his ship is attacked by pirates, led by Bowarl, and the two are caught. When a storm hits the pirate ship, the two are thrown into the sea and washed up on the shore of a solitary island in the southern ocean. To their surprise, this island is the one they have been looking for…  \n  \nThe manga that made Tezuka famous. It is an action-adventure drama inspired by Robert Louis Stevenson's book.\n\nThis is the redone version for the Tezuka 400 Complete Works.\n\nWhen time came to collect NTI for the Complete Works, Tezuka had promised that *All* of his works would get collected, but the original version was presumed lost. \n\nTezuka, wishing to keep on his promise, decided to redraw the entire manga from memory. The version restored characters previously cut (like Peter Pan). The original ending was also restored, making this the definitive version of *New Treasure Island*.\n\nAmong other alterations, this 1984 version is a 4Koma manga whereas the original was a mix of 2/3Koma.\n\n\n---\n**Volume 281 of the Osamu Tezuka Complete Works**","fr":"(amazon.fr)\n\nUn jour, un garçon nommé Pete trouve une carte de l'île aux trésors que son défunt père lui a léguée. Mais une tempête éclate et nos deux héros se retrouvent à dériver en mer sur un radeau de fortune. Ils atteignent tant bien que mal une île perdue dans l'océan... Et même mignonne comparée aux fantômes de son enfance.\nCe qui n'était au départ qu'une simple curiosité s'est transformé en une séduisante rencontre, où tous deux sont entraînés dans un rêve doux et crémeux ...\nUn rêve aussi frais que le lait et aussi doux que la crème !","tr":"Şaman babası sayesinde insan olmayan varlıkları hissetme yeteneğine sahip olan Jinhyuk, şakacı ve meraklı peri Doey'nin ona aşık olup rüyalarına girmeye başlamasıyla şaşkına döner. Masum ve zararsız bir şaka olarak başlayan şey, hızla samimiyete dönüşerek rüya ve gerçek arasındaki çizgiyi bulanıklaştırır. Aralarındaki bağ derinleştikçe Jinhyuk'un başlangıçtaki çekingenliği, Doey'nin büyüleyici varlığına karşı içini kavuran bir özleme dönüşür. Sie versucht, ihr Essen zu genießen, als sie einen unhöflichen Jungen trifft, der sie für einen Bettler hält. Obet hält sich nicht zurück und erteilt ihm eine Lektion, in dem Glauben, dass sie ihn nie wieder sehen wird. Wie es das Schicksal so will, trifft sie am nächsten Tag „den Trottel von gestern“ in ihrem Gesellschaftszimmer an! Der Junge findet heraus, dass Obet ein Mädchen ist. Sie versucht, um jeden Preis wegzulaufen. Doch der unnachgiebige Junge ist ihr dicht auf den Fersen und bedroht die Zukunft der Alphons. Was will er eigentlich? She wants to run away. But he keeps chasing after her. What does he want? Will Obet be able to separate herself from this persistent leech?\n\n---\nObet has no idea what she signed up for when she attends the prince's oath ceremony disguised as her sick twin brother. Before she can make a good impression on the prince, a snooty young lord pokes fun at her, and the two of them spend the day bickering with each other. As it turns out, the lord is none other than Hinn, the son of the grand duke. To make matters worse, he instantly recognizes Obet when he visits her estate! Once he threatens to reveal what she did and bring shame to her family, she has no choice but to be nice to him. It's easy enough to avoid him at first, but this becomes harder when they start attending the same academy. Will Obet be able to keep Hinn from exposing her secret, despite the fact that he seems to be on a mission to annoy her 24/7?\n\n---\n**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/54162322), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=8555785), [RidiBooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/1629003272)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** [BookCube](https://www.bookcube.com/toon/detail.asp?webtoon_num=220267), [Boomtoon](https://bomtoon.com/comic/ep_list/D_H_noF), [Comico](https://www.comico.kr/comic/8295), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/59594840), [Lezhin](https://www.lezhin.com/ko/comic/dont_call_friend), [MrBlue](https://www.mrblue.com/webtoon/wt_000052887), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=8561523), [RidiBooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/1180012060)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* English: [NetComics](https://www.netcomics.com/comic/17657), [Tappytoon](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/can-the-grand-duke-and-the-marquis-be-friends)\n* Chinese / 汉语: [BiliBili](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc32745), [KuaiKan](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/16945/), [PODO](https://pdt.tencentac.com/?adtag=appshare.ios.detail%26QQ%26320\u0026contentId=320\u0026platform=IA)\n* [French / Français](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/comics/can-the-grand-duke-and-the-marquis-be-friends-fr)\n* [German / Deutsch](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/comics/can-the-grand-duke-and-the-marquis-be-friends-de)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://www.webtoons.com/id/romantic-fantasy/can-the-grand-duke-and-the-marquis-be-friends/list?title_no=4796)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://www.lezhin.jp/ja/comic/taikouto)","es-la":"Un apacible día, se le presenta su primera prueba. d586b4ec-5a5b-472f-94cd-dd44886d8278:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"d586b4ec-5a5b-472f-94cd-dd44886d8278","title":{"en":"Mia - Neverland Above the Clouds"},"altTitles":[{"ja-ro":"Mia - Unjou no Neverland"},{"ja":"MIA-雲上のネバーランド-"},{"ru":"Миа - Нетландия над облаками"},{"uk":"Міа в океані живих мрій за обрієм"},{"fr":"Mia - Le pays imaginaire au dessus des nuages"}],"lastChapter":"6","availableTranslatedLanguages":["en","ru","uk"],"description":{"en":"In a city where adults go through the motions like robots, Mia feels claustrophobic. Meanwhile, the news is rife with stories of children getting kidnapped. One day, Mia runs into a young man named Joema. At his house, she sees fairies and children with animated faces. Are they holograms produced by his machine? But friendship with Joema comes with a price, Mia learns, as red-eyed Crows approach…  \n  \nИстория о людях, которые постепенно забывают о том, что когда-то было для них важным. Но всё меняется после случайной встречи сироты Мии и странного парня \"не от мира сего\", живущего в обсерватории на окраине города.  \n  \nNote: The tank doesn't separate the manga into chapters, but it was separated into 6 chapters in the online publication. The Russian group arbitrarily created 8 chapters out of the tank, hence the English and Russian releases have different total chapters.","uk":"У місті, де дорослі працюють, як роботи, Міа почувається самотньо. Це голограми, створені його машиною? However, during the \"Ritual of Ability Development\" at the entrance ceremony, the status given to Leopin was disastrous.\n\n\"Occupation: Unemployed.\"\n\"All statuses except dexterity remain at their initial values and do not grow.\"\n\"Skill is dexterous, master of none.\"\n\nLeopin's classmates exiled him because he had nothing to offer other than his dexterity. Leopin is placed in the \"Special Training Class\", a class for failures. Leopin is left all alone. However, he realizes that the skill he has been given, \"Poor Dexterity,\" has an unexpected performance. That is...\n\nYou can convert your dexterity status to any other status.\nYou can change your occupation to any one you want.\n\nThe first thing Leopin did was to become a lumberjack. First, Leopin changed his job to \"Lumberjack\" to get wood from the forest. He then became a carpenter and built the most magnificent house of all. He became an Appraiser to identify rare items, and a Battle Axe User to fight off students from other classes who tried to attack him. Become a Ranger to explore dungeons and a Ninja to get through traps with ease. Leopin, alone (solo), had gained enough power to do everything.\n\nAs Leopin continues to be a warrior, he is adored by his childhood friend, a saint, and admired by a beautiful alchemist, and his activities become even more well known. On the other hand, the classmates who expelled Leopin regret their decision to do so when they witness Leopin's abilities. Their home remains a shack, they are unable to explore, and they gradually lose their place in the school and are ruined.\n___\n**Explanation:** the skill is not \"poor dexterity\", but \"dexterous poor\", which is the Japanese equivalent to a Jack of all trades, master of none; since they can do a bit of everything, they are \"dexterous\", but since they have mastered none, they supposedly cannot make a living from it, hence they are \"poor\". Сначала это было так, но вскоре любимец девушек вручает своё сердце лишь одной. After years of taking care of the older Yuu, can Shunji let his brother go?  \n  \n7: The Curse  \nA man, cursed to forget the past, struggles to remember.","pt-br":"1) Assim como o tempo, a chuva virá novamente. À medida que lentamente evoluí um relacionamento, será que as lembranças do garoto vão destruir seus frágeis laços?\n\n2) Um ciclo incerto. Tsuda conhece Hitomi a sua vida toda, mas nunca foram próximos. Tsuda, notando a personalidade de Hitomi no inicio e o evita desde então. Então, por que Hitomi está parado de pé em frente a sua porta?\n\n3) Alterando as probabilidades. Tsuda e Hitomi se reencontram.\n\n4) Reflexões na água. Um terrível segredo assombra um assalariado, que de repente reencontra o ex namorado de sua irmã.\n\n6) Um futon vazio. Shunji descobriu que seu irmão Yuu tinha uma namorada quando eles decidiram se mudar, mas essa namorada é na verdade um namorado!
